\dThe rice harvest season is almost on us again.\d%K%P
The ears of rice were dancing in the fall winds.%K%P
It was the very picture of the autumn harvest.%K%P
\dNot long until the fall festival now, is it?\d%K%P
\dFestival season already, huh? Wonder what's up for\nthis year?\d%K%P
The annual festivities at Kamimori Shrine were\nalways lavish.%K%P
The shrine grounds my family looked after were part\nof a branch. The main shrine was in the center of\ntown.%K%P
Kamimori's fall festival was held at the main\nshrine, and it was always packed with visitors\nevery single year.%K%P
\dWho cares about any of that? Why does Akira even\nhave to be here?\d%K%P
We all came out together, but Yukari didn't seem\npleased.%K%P
\dNever hurts to have a man around to help with a\nmove, right?\d%K%P
\dSorry to bother you. But even if Kaede could\nhandle all her stuff, I've got tons, too.\d%K%P
\dIf you didn't want to accompany us, you could have\njust stayed behind.\d%K%P
\dAny good husband needs his wife. I simply follow\nAkira wherever he may take me.\d%K%P
\dSounds pretty stalker-ish to me, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dStalkers act out of their own one-sided love.\nThere is no stalking when that love is mutual, like\nours.\d%K%P
\dPfff, spoken like a true stalker.\d%K%P
\dGrrr!\d%K%P
Getting called out stirred Yukari's Jinriki into\naction.%K%P
\dI am NOT a stalker!\d%K%P
And just like that, her black Jinriki power was set\nfree.%K%P
\dJeez! Coming straight out with a Tatari attack,\nhuh?\d%K%P
\dWait...what? Nothing happened.\d%K%P
It had looked like the Tatari had moved to attack\nShion, but she was completely unfazed.%K%P
\dWas that a dud or something?\d%K%P
\dShion! Up! Above you!\d%K%P
\dHuh?\d%K%P
\dWaaah!\d%K%P
A metal bucket appeared above Shion and crashed\ndown on her head.%K%P
\dWhat was that even doing out here...?\d%K%P
Before I could guess it was suddenly gone.%K%P
\dWas that part of your Tatari?\d%K%P
\dWho knows? It's not like I get choose what\nhappens.\d%K%P
She had a completely untroubled look on her face.%K%P
One that almost said, 'that was nothing.'%K%P
\dYeowch... That wasn't very nice...\d%K%P
\dMaybe we should be glad it was just a bucket. Who\nknows, it could have been some heavy weights or\nsomething...\d%K%P
\dY-Yikes. That'd be the end of me.\d%K%P
That's not a sight I would want to see.%K%P
\dBut, I don't think it would ever come to that.\d%K%P
\dBecause I have my dearest husband with me, see?\nAs long as he's by my side the Tatari will never\nget too strong.\d%K%P
Yukari grabbed onto my arm as if to taunt the\nothers.%K%P
\dHey, you don't have to press your chest into me\nlike that...\d%K%P
\dThat's just a treat from your sweet wife!\d%K%P
\dYeah...\d%K%P
She wasn't holding back. All sorts of signals were\nshooting through my brain.%K%P
\dHow about a treat from your better half too?\d%K%P
Not to be outdone, Kaede pressed herself into me\nfrom the other side.%K%P
\dWell? I'm not about to be beaten by her.\d%K%P
\dWhoa Kaede, no holding back from you, huh?\d%K%P
\dYou know, I can't figure out why you never did\nthis before.\d%K%P
\dW-W-Well, I didn't want to see him stolen away...\d%K%P
\dSo you're telling me you wouldn't have had the\nguts to if I hadn't come along first...?\d%K%P
\dYeah, I'm a wimp! So what?!\d%K%P
I never expected her to just up and admit it.%K%P
Kaede always seemed so strong and dependable. I\nnever would have thought otherwise.%K%P
\dAre you disappointed in me, Akira...?\d%K%P
\dOf course not.\d%K%P
\dIt's more like I got to see a wonderful new side\nof you.\d%K%P
It was almost refreshing seeing her like this. It\nexcited me.%K%P
\dGah... Here I am doing the same exact thing, but\nshe looks better for it...\d%K%P
\dJust when I had finally found Akira... The only\none who can accept me for what I am...\d%K%P
\dHey, uh, that Tatari of hers is starting to spill\nout again.\d%K%P
\dAh, sorry about that. Just a slip.\d%K%P
\dLatching on to me isn't enough to stop it?\d%K%P
\dYou'd better get a little closer.\d%K%P
She had been clinging pretty close anyway, but I\ndrew her in and held her tighter.%K%P
\dOh, Akira...\d%K%P
\dLet's just take things slow, shall we?\d%K%P
\dS-Sure.\d%K%P
As we made our way through the golden sea of rice\nfields and out to the konnyaku fields, the scenery\nchanged dramatically.%K%P
\dWhat is this place...?\d%K%P
\dThat over there is the Chinju Forest. The Kamimori\nrear shrine is right in the middle of it.\d%K%P
\dKaede and I live out there.\d%K%P
\dWe do now, at least...\d%K%P
I saw Kaede's expression darken ever so slightly.%K%P
They lived a normal life out there now, but things\nhadn't always gone so smoothly.%K%P
\dYou live there? There...?\d%K%P
\dYou can tell something's off?\d%K%P
\dI don't think you even need to be a Goddess to see\nthat.\d%K%P
\dI mean, it looks like time has stopped...\d%K%P
We were right in the middle of fall and its\nfoliage.%K%P
But the forest was still stuck in midsummer.%K%P
The endless summer was a sign of its holy sanctity.%K%P
Once, this forbidden forest had acted as a barrier\nto seal away Kaede, its resident Tatarigami.%K%P
\dLet's get a move on. I'd like to finish the whole\nmove today.\d%K%P
Kaede took the lead, gallantly striding toward the\nmidsummer shrine.%K%P
We followed behind, heading into the forest--%K%P
\dWaaah!\d%K%P
Yukari held her nose as if she had walked into\nsomething.%K%P
\dYukari? What's the matter?\d%K%P
\dI don't know...\d%K%P
\dBut I think this barrier is refusing to let me\nthrough!\d%K%P
\dYeah, duh. You're a Tatarigami.\d%K%P
\dSo sorry, but these are holy grounds. We can't let\nany evil pass through.\d%K%P
\dThat's discrimination! This is absurd!\d%K%P
\dThat's the way it is. You just stay here and wait\nfor us.\d%K%P
\dNo waaay!\d%K%P
We left Yukari behind and made our way into the\nChinju Forest.%K%P
Before long we arrived at the rear shrine.%K%P
\dWow, this is...\d%K%P
The rear shrine was the most holy of places at\nKamimori Shrine.%K%P
At least it was supposed to be, but right now it\ndidn't look it.%K%P
\dShocking, yes? It's quite a mess.\d%K%P
\dHey, I didn't know Aki would be coming by...\d%K%P
The place was very clearly divided into a neat zone\nand messy zone.%K%P
As you might expect, the messy part was all Shion,\nand the organized part was Kaede's.%K%P
\dThis is what you get for not tidying up\nregularly.\d%K%P
\dYeah...\d%K%P
\dHere's your chance to get it spick and span once\nand for all.\d%K%P
\dAll by myself? No way! Aki, you'll help me,\nright?\d%K%P
\dMy mistress calls to me, you see?\d%K%P
\dAbsolutely not. As your better half I must\nrefuse.\d%K%P
\dOh, come on!\d%K%P
Shion ended up having to clean up and pack all by\nherself. It was probably for her own good, anyway.%K%P
\dYou've really kept things organized here, Kaede.\d%K%P
\dThis is normal. It's Shion who's out of control.\d%K%P
\dYeah, true.\d%K%P
I'm no neat freak myself, but keeping things clean\nand tidy is part of the job when you're tending a\nshrine.%K%P
Without a doubt, Shion was the odd one out - a\ncomplete mess of a Goddess.%K%P
\dYou sure it was okay not letting Yukari in here?\d%K%P
I didn't say anything earlier, but I knew the\ntruth.%K%P
That whole barrier was part of Kaede's power, and\nshe could control it at will.%K%P
\dYou think I was being mean?\d%K%P
\dNo... You wouldn't do that for no reason, right?\d%K%P
\dHeh, there's no fooling you, is there?\d%K%P
\dI left her out there because I wanted to talk with\nyou.\d%K%P
She led me away to the back of the shrine.%K%P
Shion was too busy cleaning to notice us leave.%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
She closed the distance between us, and then took\nmy arm and latched on to it.%K%P
\dKaede?!\d%K%P
\dJust stay still. This is an important part of the\nprocess...\d%K%P
She spoke with conviction, but I had no idea what\nshe meant.%K%P
\dSorry, you probably don't know what's going on,\nhuh?\d%K%P
\dWell, no...\d%K%P
Just thinking of where my arm was right now had my\nhead spinning.%K%P
That bust of hers was obvious even through her\noutfit. And right now I could feel it pressing up\nagainst my arm as she moved closer.%K%P
\dYukari just showed up out of nowhere, proclaiming\nherself as your wife...\d%K%P
\dThen Shion and I both claimed our own roles, too.\nIt must all be so hard on you.\d%K%P
\dOh, that, yeah...\d%K%P
\dHuh?\d%K%P
\dNo, never mind.\d%K%P
I couldn't think straight with that soft feeling on\nmy arm.%K%P
But apparently that wasn't what this talk was\nabout.%K%P
\dYou know just as well as I do that your parents\nleft you to me.\d%K%P
\dI could never tell them that their successor,\ntheir son, had fallen to depravity.\d%K%P
\dThat's why I want you to stay true to your\nconvictions. Don't yield to the temptations Yukari\nbrings. Keep your mind and body clean and pure...\d%K%P
She spoke passionately, and her grip grew stronger.%K%P
We were now so close I could almost feel her\nheartbeat.%K%P
\dStill, I know you are a young and healthy man, and\nyou'll want to give into your more carnal desires.\d%K%P
\dThat's why... A-And this is just a suggestion,\nbut...\d%K%P
\dIf you truly cannot resist the urge, you can\nalways come to me. Just like you did...that day.\d%K%P
She looked at me with a fire in her eyes.%K%P
This was no joke. She meant it.%K%P
She truly wanted to continue what we started back\non that day.%K%P
Her face burned bright red.%K%P
It was clear that she had gone beyond her normal\nboundaries to say this.%K%P
\dYou're really struggling with this, huh?\d%K%P
\dW-Well...yes, of course.\d%K%P
\dIt's all so embarrassing, and with you it's\njust...\d%K%P
She was now red all the way down her neck.%K%P
But she still hadn't let go of my arm.%K%P
It was clear that she was ready to see this\nthrough.%K%P
\dIt's fine. Okay?\d%K%P
\dDon't hold back. You liked these, right?\d%K%P
I found my palms on her breasts.%K%P
And she pushed them into my hands.%K%P
\dSoft, right?\d%K%P
\dThey are, yeah...\d%K%P
\dHeh, don't be shy now. Go on. Don't hold back.\d%K%P
\dIf you insist...\d%K%P
Trying to keep my cool as best as I could, I gave\nthem a squeeze.%K%P
\dWow, this is...\d%K%P
She was still fully clothed, but the sensation was\nso overpowering it made me gulp.%K%P
\dD-Do you like them? I'm sure they're bigger than\nhers, at least.\d%K%P
Of course they were.%K%P
Yukari wasn't flat-chested by any means, but Kaede\nhad volume on a whole different level.%K%P
\dI'm yours, you know... So you never have to\nhesitate...\d%K%P
\dN-Never?\d%K%P
That was the best news I'd heard in a while.%K%P
I was already at the edge of my wits.%K%P
\dI'm sure Yukari would let you too, but just let me\nhandle those needs, all right?\d%K%P
\dI'm at least, you know...approved by your parents\nand whatnot...\d%K%P
So that's where this was going.%K%P
My parents being who they are, they'd probably\nonly meant it as a joke.%K%P
\dSo? If you want to, we can take things further\nthan this...\d%K%P
\dWell uhh, not here. Not like this, right?\d%K%P
Shion could stumble upon us any second.%K%P
I might have been losing control, but even I\ncouldn't handle Shion being there watching.%K%P
\dThen we'll stop here, just for now... Okay?\d%K%P
One more time she pressed my hands into her chest.%K%P
Her eyes told me to have my fun.%K%P
\dIt's still kind of embarrassing, but I'll do what\nI must... I'll work to be a deterrent against\nher...\d%K%P
\dI'll live up to being called your 'better half,'\nwhatever it takes...\d%K%P
